1.0.2.name: connect20/Mconnect_Productribbon
1.0.2.description: If you are looking to promote your products with product label or ribbon this extension is for you. Upload the transparent image from backend interface and extension will automatically show that image at suitable products.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
